abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by telling a hard truth with compassion, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a weak hit, envision how the hearer may take offense and complicate your situation.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} with heroic courage or exceptional loyalty, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} in direct pursuit of fulfilling an iron vow, add +1. Additionally, you may roll +heart instead of +health or +iron.
